title: base-frontends
description: Minimal starter templates with no custom features: side panel (action opens panel), overlay (injected floating UI on pages), highlight-to-action (context menu on selection or right-click).
example_use_cases: Start a new extension from a side panel, overlay, or highlight-to-action base

title: audio-capture
description: Captures audio from browser tabs for analysis, detection, or processing workflows. Provides tab audio capture infrastructure that can be extended with analysis, file upload, and results display functionality.
example_use_cases: Detect AI generated deepfake audio content from tab audio capture
Record tab audio for analysis, verification, or processing workflows

title: ai-browser-agent
description: AI-powered browser automation assistant with multi-agent system. Features a chat interface for natural language commands and autonomous browsing.
example_use_cases: Create an AI assistant that can navigate websites and extract information based on natural language queries
Build a browser automation agent that can perform multi-step web tasks like form filling, data scraping, and content analysis
Develop an intelligent research assistant that can browse multiple pages and summarize findings

title: notifications
description: URL-triggered toast-style notifications that display when users visit specific websites.
example_use_cases: Show welcome messages or announcements when users visit specific domains
Display warnings or reminders on certain pages
Display rewards or incentives when users visit specific pages

title: content-block
description: Blocks network requests and hides page elements using declarative rules and CSS selectors.
example_use_cases: Block ads, trackers, and unwanted content

title: tab-manager
description: Save and restore browser tab sessions as named workspaces for easy context switching.
example_use_cases: Save work sessions with multiple tabs for later restoration
Create named workspaces for different projects
Quick save and restore browsing contexts

title: chat-with-ai-provider
description: Bare-bones chat UI that talks to an LLM provider (e.g. OpenAI) using your API key.
example_use_cases: Add a quick AI assistant to any page via overlay or side panel
Build a custom chat extension with your own API key and model

title: speech-to-text-webkit
description: Minimal WebKit-only speech-to-text template. Uses the browserâ€™s Speech Recognition API, can be adapted to other speech-to-text APIs.
example_use_cases: Voice input to plug into forms or chat
